Articles.Content:
So I designed a space station that makes use of the new EVA feature to have an explorable interior. This is the second model, Complete with two ports(for extra vehicles) and rooms. I call it, the Galaxy 2 Space Station.

By

Blairospace

'We do science and stuff...'
soo cool
sweet
Care to share the download? It looks really cool!

can we have an download link?

please. Really nice!
bdawg, your work is over ?
that is so awsome!

Sorry it\'s taken so long, I haven\'t been getting notifications. I have a new version that\'s a little bigger, doesn\'t have any interior work, but it has two levels, one with a large docking bay. I\'d love to share the file so you all could play around with it, but I\'m not exactly sure how to go about doing that, being the noob I am.

SO! Now I have the Galaxy 3. Roomier, much more stable and easier to get into orbit. The shuttle port now has a door made of landing gear and off-board ladders, in case your kerbins want to catch the view outside. Looks nice too

New from

Blairospace

'We do science and stuff...'

here is the file for my newest model. Enjoy.

https://dl.dropbox.com/u/94630383/Galaxy%203.craft
I\'ve been working on IVAs in a similar way. I\'ve only gotten as far as concept vehicles. Boats mostly.
Amazing Design, but have you actually designed a craft to dock with it
Looks sweet !!
That is amazing! I need to try something like that myself some time...

Amazing Design, but have you actually designed a craft to dock with it

That is the next step. Just building the rail before the train arrives at this point
Mate, you wouldn\'t mind if I steal ur idea\design.. :-P

That is the next step. Just building the rail before the train arrives at this point

Is docking possible? Or do you just improve a solution?

I want to do something like that too, but I donÂ´t think im good enough
I think the closest thing you can get you can get to docking is to have one craft hold on to another.
Could I get launch instructions please? I am new and I press launch but nothing happens :/
Holy crap thats awesome... my computer wouldn\'t be able to handle it though lol...

Mate, you wouldn\'t mind if I steal ur idea\design.. :-P

Please, go right ahead. If you can improve upon it, then do that too; I\'d love to see what can be done with it.

Could I get launch instructions please? I am new and I press launch but nothing happens :/

Haha I don\'t even have to check, I know what the problem is: When I launch this, I adjusted the order of operations to be perfect. But at it\'s default it might be a little crazy. Let me go back adjust it and make it easier for y\'all. I\'ll have an upload shortly.
Did you make that with the flat wing section things? That\'s pretty cool, I wonder if my SSTO fits in the docking port... If not I\'m using your idea.

Okay so here\'s the part with the proper order of launch operations: https://dl.dropbox.com/u/94630383/Galaxy%203.craft

The trick to getting this massive piece of home into a proper orbit is to conserve fuel by monitoring atmospheric pressure. The less pressure the lower on the throttle you can be while maintaining speed increase.

Hope that helps.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=17550.0

here, thatÂ´s what I made with your Idea, thank you^^
